title: 08/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/25/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why the Cowboys haven't had postseason success in over 2 decades based on something he saw on Hard Knocks. He elevates one NFL team back into Super Bowl contention based on one trade that fills a big hole on their roster. He also reacts to breaking news that the Broncos are going with Teddy Bridgewater as their starting quarterback over Drew Lock. Plus, 2-time Super Bowl champion Phil Simms joins the show to talk about Drew Lock's future after getting benched and what we should expect from the Cowboys this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
